title: BITS Pilani Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS) Pilani has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those Candidates who have qualified for B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the BITS Pilani Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on ...
